pageProps.title: Quality
pageProps.content:
#### Quality is:
1. User can solve their tasks effectively. It is external quality.
2. Developer can quickly understand how to make a new change. It is internal quality.
3. Developer can quickly implement the change. It is also internal quality.

#### Related notes
- [Engineering →](/notes/Engineering)
- [Internal quality means fast →](/notes/Internal%20quality%20means%20fast)
